## utils.dom.addClass() function

Add a CSS class to a element.

Handles multiple space-separated classes for legacy reasons.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function addClass(element: Element, className: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | Element | DOM element to add class to. |
|  className | string | Name of class to add. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if class was added, false if already present.
